Posts.Content: Fair, I'm right on your tail, our stats almost identical. Gleason 9, Failed RRP, SRT and now PSA starting to climb above undetectable. I think I know how this book is going to end and frankly, I am very depressed. There are days (more frequently) when I wish I could end it all. I think all these new drugs are much hype with little real progress in dealing with refractory hormone treatment. The Old Sailor
